name: Articuno
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

poke_power.name: Freezing Screech
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Articuno from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
